channel.title: Chatbox effects and colours? Delta
channel.description: two things: the first being my server does not have any effects such as red: wave: etc how can i add them?? second the @red@ @cya@ etc commands to make the chatbox coloured this is a lower priority but would still be nice, How can i get both of these working??

item.title: Chatbox effects and colours? Delta
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“arcuza, post:1, topic:430383”]two things:
the first being my server does not have any effects such as red: wave: etc how can i add them??
second the @red@ @cya@ etc commands to make the chatbox coloured this is a lower priority but would still be nice,
How can i get both of these working??[/quote]

Do you mean that they don’t work in the game world? Or do you mean in the chatbox? I wouldn’t really want wavy chat messages in my chatbox.

Read full topic
